mapper.insert: insert into mri_quantification value(null, #{mri_image_id}, #{大小}, #{体积}, #{数量}, #{包膜厚度}, #{DWI_ADC}, #{DTI_ADC}, #{DTI_FA}, #{DKI_MK}, #{DKI_Ka}, #{DKI_Kr}, #{DKI_FAK}, #{DKI_MD}, #{DKI_Da}, #{DKI_Dr}, #{DKI_FA}, #{IVIM_Standard}, #{IVIM_D_mono}, #{IVIM_D$_mono}, #{IVIM_fmono}, #{IVIM_D_Bi}, #{IVIM_D$_Bi}, #{IVIM_fBi}, #{IVIM_DDC}, #{IVIM_α}, #{ESWAN_R2$}, #{ESWAN_T2$}, #{ESWAN_相位值}, #{ESWAN_幅度值}, #{IDIQ_R2}, #{IDIQ_脂肪分数}, #{MRS_胆碱}, #{MRS_肌酸}, #{MRS_枸橼酸盐}, #{APT_MTRasym}, #{mDIXON_Quant_R2}, #{mDIXON_Quant_脂肪分数}, #{T1_mapping_T1}, #{T2_mapping_T2}, #{DCE_Ktrans}, #{DCE_Kep}, #{DCE_Ve}, #{DCE_Vp}, #{DCE_MSI}, #{DCE_TTP}, #{other});
